snippet: Anti-abortion measures are used to control childbirth decisions.
abstract: Op-Ed article by lawyer Lynn M Paltrow and Prof Jeanne Flavin warns anti-abortion laws being passed by Republicans pose risk to all pregnant women, even those who want to be pregnant; holds such laws are increasingly being used as basis for arresting women who have no intention of ending pregnancy and for preventing women from making their own decisions about how they will give birth; warns such cases focus exclusively on abortion at expense of woman's civil rights.

byline.original: By LYNN M. PALTROW and JEANNE FLAVIN

lead_paragraph: Anti-abortion measures are used to control childbirth decisions.
